statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (9,-11) and (13,-7).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{7}-{\left(-{11}\right)}}}{{{13}-{\left({9}\right)}}}=\frac{{4}}{{4}} which reduces to \displaystyle{1} (if it's not already reduced)
